title: AnyDVD-Fix BRD.7z
description:
This is the latest patch BRD that should fix the problem concerning my previous torrent about AnyDVD HD 7.4.5.0 Final.

Despite functional crack that was included within, some people have reported 
a possible security hole due to a bad trojan hidden in both dll.

So please, do proceed like this :

A)disconnect from internet and start complete uninstallation of AnyDVD but do not reboot immediately afterwards.
(use iobit uninstaller for a perfect clean uninstallation)

B)start a complete scan with your anti-virus to see if you could see, find and discover
this famous trojan as described by some people due to both dll.

C)whatever your anti-virus could discovering , be sure to completely erase your AnyDVD folder that contains this specific dll and clean your recycle bin as well.

D)reboot as still disconnected from internet.

E)reinstall AnyDVD and run it and uncheck : "check automatically new update"
in its general menu settings option.

F)Close AnyDVD and be sure its icon is not running as well in your taskbar.

G) for now use BRD patch as administrator and proceed to complete use to get full functional AnyDVD soft.

H)now, reload and run again AntDVD to see if all is ok (it should be anyway)

I)reconnect to internet and now enjoy and have fun

enjoy and regards
